title: Japanese Greetings and Phrases Quiz
description: Test your knowledge of essential Japanese greetings and phrases with this quiz. From 'Good morning' to 'Thank you' and beyond, each question provides options, a hint, and the correct answer in Japanese characters and Romaji. Immerse yourself in the politeness and cultural nuances of Japanese expressions!

items.question: こんにちは
items.hint: The Japanese greeting for 'Hello' or 'Good afternoon.'

items.question: ごめんなさい
items.hint: The Japanese apology phrase for 'I'm sorry.'

items.question: おはしをください
items.hint: The Japanese phrase for 'Please give me chopsticks.'

items.question: いただきます
items.hint: The Japanese expression said before eating, similar to saying 'Bon appétit.'

items.question: おつかれさまでした
items.hint: The Japanese phrase used to thank someone for their hard work, similar to saying 'Thank you for your hard work.'

items.question: わたしは にほんご がくせい です
items.hint: The Japanese phrase for 'I am a Japanese language student.'
